name: Warm winter...at 2000 meters above sea level
description:
Climate change is setting new (negative) records this winter...despite the beauty of the view, I was literally shocked to find no snow and such warm temperature at almost 2000 meters above s.l. on the alps! I spent a huge part of my childhood and adolescence among these mountains and every year is warmer..and warmer.

This is a panorama shot (approx. 60cm x 30cm printed) that I took at the beginning of Jan. 2022 in Val D'Otro, a stunning later valley of Valsesia, Piedmont, Italy.
On the left you can spot Monte Tagliaferro and Cima Carnera peaks, together with the rest of the valley on the right.
